about.title: About CropSense AI
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing Agriculture Through Artificial Intelligence
about.missionText: CropSense AI is dedicated to empowering farmers and agricultural professionals with cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology. We aim to revolutionize traditional farming practices by providing intelligent insights for crop monitoring, disease detection, and yield optimization.
about.visionText: We envision a world where every farmer has access to advanced agricultural intelligence, leading to sustainable farming practices, increased productivity, and food security for all.
about.aiPoweredDesc: Advanced machine learning algorithms for accurate crop analysis and disease detection
about.realTimeDesc: Continuous monitoring of crop health and environmental conditions
about.diseaseDetectionDesc: Early identification of plant diseases with recommended treatment solutions
about.yieldPredictionDesc: Accurate forecasting of crop yields based on current conditions
about.smartRecommendationsDesc: Personalized farming recommendations based on local conditions
about.dataAnalyticsDesc: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for informed decision making
about.technologyDesc: Built with cutting-edge technologies including machine learning, computer vision, and cloud computing to deliver reliable and scalable agricultural solutions.
about.contactDesc: Get in touch with our team for partnerships, support, or inquiries about CropSense AI solutions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: CropSense AI respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly and automatically through our services.
privacy.dataUseText: Data is used to provide, maintain, and improve our agricultural intelligence services.
privacy.dataSharingText: We don't sell personal data. Limited sharing with service providers as needed.
privacy.dataStorageText: Data stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security measures.
privacy.userRightsText: You have rights to access, update, delete, and control your personal information.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve user experience and analyze service usage.
privacy.minorsText: Service not directed to individuals under 16.
privacy.changesText: We will post updates here and adjust the revision date.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By using CropSense AI, you agree to these terms.
terms.servicesText: AI-powered agricultural intelligence and crop monitoring platform.
terms.userResponsibilitiesText: Use services lawfully and responsibly. Don't misuse or attempt unauthorized access.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: CropSense AI owns all rights to the service, algorithms, and content.
terms.limitationsText: Services provided 'as is'. We don't guarantee specific outcomes or results.
terms.terminationText: Either party may terminate. CropSense AI may suspend access for violations.
terms.changesText: Terms may be updated. Continued use implies acceptance of changes.
